name: Dolce Media Group
description:
Dolce Media Group is an award winning creative firm located in Toronto Canada specializing in website design and development, print, graphic design, marketing strategy and execution for businesses across the communities of Vaughan and Toronto since 1996.
Boasting years of experience in custom publishing and strategic company branding, our wide-reaching websites, marketing and print campaigns have transformed fledgling businesses into mainstays and well-recognized brands into strongholds in their respective demographics. The DMG team delivers optimum turnkey responses to advertising, publishing and marketing quandaries to a wide range of clients.
